title: Hyper Luck - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Gamers   Lucky Protagonist   Magic   Male Protagonist   MMORPG   Overpowered Protagonist   Sword Wielder   Virtual Reality
author: ZOD
description:
The luck that was missing from my life, came all at once before quitting the game.

Lee Ki-Ho, who tried to turn his life around in the world’s first virtual reality game, claimed the rare item not one in 4 billion players ever came across!

“He really went from rags to riches!”>
